sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Envelope, EnvelopeFill, Facebook, GeoAlt, GeoAltFill, Google, Instagram, Linkedin, TelephoneFill, Twitter, Youtube, } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function Footer() { const router = useNavigate(); const { pathname } = useLocation(); console.log(pathname); useEffect(() => { if (pathname == "/contacts" || pathname == "/") { document.getElementById("footsec").style.display = "none"; } else { document.getElementById("footsec").style.display = "block"; } }, [pathname]); return (
{/*
{router('/contacts')}} >

Lets Talk

To

Team Patch Work

teampatchworkps@gmail.com

Instagram

Twitter

Facebook

Linked in

{router('/')}}>HOME
{router('/about')}}>ABOUT US
{router('/works')}}>WORKS
{router('/service')}}>OUR SERVICE
{router('/contacts')}}>CONTACT US
*/} {/*

TEAM PATCH WORK TEAM PATCH WORK

*/}
); } export default Footer;
